dialogue.text: You are looking a lot less... twitchy today.
Yeah, that herbal tea you gave me is keeping my heartbeat from being defening.
I mean, tell me the one with the swords isn't out for blood!
OH! You mean the taiko drummer with the sick dragon tattoo?
He's been through a lot, you could even learn a thing or two from him!
You're making it sound like that's who you want me to meet...
This is my friend who I was telling you about.
The one trying to start a band!
